title: Can't start League of Legend Launcher
body: I can't launch League of Legend, when I try it gives me this menssage:  "Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connectiom is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access". Any help?

replies.body: This error is usually caused by a permissions problem that's preventing the patcher from launching.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to adjust your settings and get that access restored.  Let me know if you have any questions!
